summary.notes: Budget is significantly over by 963.47 EUR (96.35% over). Main contributors: Photography session Day 14 (350 EUR), Disneyland Day 6 (76.79 EUR), Premium dining throughout trip (especially Shanghai Michelin restaurants and Beijing roast duck), Entertainment/nightlife activities (jazz clubs, rooftop bars estimated 150-200 EUR total across multiple days).

warnings.description: Day 14 total cost 400.26 EUR - highest single day. Photography session alone is 350 EUR (35% of total budget).
warnings.recommendation: CRITICAL: Photography session is single largest expense. Consider: (1) Reduce session to 1-hour basic package (~150 EUR), (2) Skip photography entirely to save 350 EUR, (3) Use smartphone with tripod for self-portraits at Forbidden City instead.

warnings.description: Shanghai Disneyland ticket 599 CNY (76.79 EUR per person). Day total 122.94 EUR.
warnings.recommendation: Disneyland is second largest single expense (7.7% of budget). Cannot be reduced without skipping entirely. Consider if full-day theme park is priority vs. other activities.

warnings.description: Total meal costs 722.98 EUR (36.8% of budget). Premium dining includes multiple Michelin restaurants, upscale roast duck, Japanese BBQ.
warnings.recommendation: High meal costs driven by: Shanghai 人和馆 (25.64 EUR), 白茸 (32.05 EUR), AJIYA (44.87 EUR), Beijing 大董 (38.46 EUR), 全聚德 (32.05 EUR). Recommend: (1) Replace 2-3 upscale restaurants with mid-range options to save 80-120 EUR, (2) Skip one Michelin restaurant in Shanghai, (3) Choose 四季民福 over 大董 for duck (save 15 EUR).

warnings.description: Entertainment activities (jazz clubs, rooftop bars, boat rides) estimated 150-200 EUR total across Days 10-20.
warnings.recommendation: Optional evening activities add significant cost: East Shore Jazz (30 EUR), MO Bar (40 EUR), Jianghu Bar (25 EUR), Blue Note (50 EUR), Peninsula Lounge (45 EUR). These are all OPTIONAL. Skip 3-4 of these venues to save 100-140 EUR.

warnings.description: Transportation costs reasonable but include expensive taxis (Daxing Airport 25.64 EUR, airport transfers).
warnings.recommendation: Transportation is well-managed. Only potential savings: Use metro instead of taxi where time permits (save 5-10 EUR total across trip, but limited opportunities).

warnings.description: Day 7 meal costs very high: 白茸 Michelin lunch (32.05 EUR) + AJIYA Japanese BBQ dinner (44.87 EUR) = 76.92 EUR for meals alone.
warnings.recommendation: Two premium restaurants in one day. Consider: (1) Replace 白茸 lunch with casual xiaolongbao spot (save 25 EUR), (2) Keep AJIYA as it's a must-do, OR (3) Swap AJIYA to a good but non-premium yakiniku (save 20 EUR).

recommendations.recommendation: CRITICAL COST REDUCTION: Skip or significantly reduce photography session (Day 14). This single activity is 35% of total budget and 17.8% over budget alone. Alternatives: (1) Self-portraits with smartphone/tripod at Forbidden City (free), (2) Book 1-hour basic session instead of 3-4 hours (~150 EUR, save 200 EUR), (3) Skip entirely to bring budget closer to target.

REDUCE PREMIUM DINING: Replace 2-3 upscale restaurants with excellent mid-range alternatives: (1) Day 5 人和馆 → Local Benbang restaurant (save 15 EUR), (2) Day 7 白茸 → Xiaolongbao specialist like 佳家汤包 (save 25 EUR), (3) Day 16 大董 → 四季民福 roast duck (save 15 EUR), (4) Day 7 AJIYA → Good local yakiniku not premium (save 20 EUR). Still enjoy great food at 40% lower cost.

SKIP OPTIONAL NIGHTLIFE: Most evening entertainment is optional. Reduce from 7 venues to 2-3: Keep East Shore Jazz (cultural experience) and one rooftop bar (Peninsula or MO Bar for special occasion). Skip: CJ Lounge, Jianghu Bar, Blue Note, Liangma River boat, one rooftop bar. Still have memorable evenings but save 100-140 EUR.

RECONSIDER DISNEYLAND: Shanghai Disneyland is 2nd largest expense (76.79 EUR). If budget is critical constraint, consider skipping theme park entirely and instead: Spend day at Shanghai niche spots (bookstores, cafes, Tianzifang, art galleries) which aligns better with girlfriend's INFJ personality. This saves 76.79 EUR and may be more meaningful experience. However, if Disneyland is a priority, keep it and cut elsewhere.

REDUCE SHOPPING: Shopping was noted as '购物需求不大' (not a big shopping need) but budget includes ~430 CNY (55 EUR) shopping across days: Taikoo Li Chengdu (25.64), Shanghai Tianzifang/Xintiandi (50 EUR combined), Beijing 798/Nanluoguxiang/Sanlitun (~90 EUR). Keep POP MART cute toy purchases (girlfriend's interest) but reduce fashion shopping by 50% to save ~60 EUR. Note: Shopping was excluded from original budget per user, so this is bonus savings.

OPTIMIZE BEIJING DINING DAYS 10-13: Several Beijing dinners are premium (150-250 CNY). Replace 2 dinners with excellent but affordable local options: (1) Day 10 南门涮肉 → University area student-friendly hotpot (save 8 EUR), (2) Day 11 全聚德 → Skip famous chain, try local roast duck spot (save 15 EUR), (3) Day 13 花家怡园 → Neighborhood Sichuan restaurant (save 12 EUR). Total savings: 35 EUR while still eating very well.

COMBINED OPTIMIZATION STRATEGY to meet 1000 EUR budget: (1) Skip photography (save 350 EUR) - BIGGEST IMPACT, (2) Replace 2 Michelin/upscale restaurants with excellent mid-range (save 40 EUR), (3) Reduce nightlife from 7 to 2 venues (save 120 EUR), (4) Reduce fashion shopping by 50% (save 60 EUR), (5) Optimize 2-3 Beijing dinners (save 30 EUR). TOTAL SAVINGS: ~600 EUR, bringing trip cost to ~1360 EUR (still 360 EUR over, but 63% closer to target). To meet exactly 1000 EUR budget, also skip Disneyland (save additional 77 EUR) and replace 2 more upscale dinners (save 30 EUR).
